item.title: @elonmusk: SpaceXâ€™s Raptor 3 engine is sublime engineering â€¢ No basic heat shield needed â†’ saves mass and drama...
item.description: SpaceXâ€™s Raptor 3 engine is sublime engineering â€¢ No basic heat shield needed â†’ saves mass and dramatically boosts reliability â€¢ Small fuel leaks arenâ€™t dangerous â€” they simply burn off safely in the open plasma â€¢ Major improvements in payload capacity, efficiency, and overall reliability â€¢ Radically simplified design with deeply integrated electronics and fluid systems â€¢ So clean and minimalist that even propulsion experts initially thought it looked â€œunfinishedâ€
